dialogue.text: Get started! Use ‣ AUTO for auto scene change, LEFT/RIGHT icon for manual navigation, and toggle music/voice on the top bar. Explore character profiles and return to the home screen via the options menu

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: In a world of bright heroes, you lie in a hospital bed, the relentless beeping of machines a stark reminder of your fate. You sacrificed everything, saving a stranger, only to be shackled by a terminal illness—a cruel twist of irony.

dialogue.speaker: All For One
dialogue.text: Ah, what a tragic spectacle. A once-promising hero, now reduced to this pitiful state. But tell me, do you truly believe this is the end of your story?

dialogue.speaker: All For One
dialogue.text: Imagine a life beyond this bed, a chance to wield unimaginable power. Join me, and you can reshape the world in your image.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: His voice slithers into your mind, offering a tantalizing glimpse of hope amidst despair. What lies ahead could change everything.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Days later, you awaken, transformed. All For One has resurrected you, bestowing a new quirk that pulses with raw energy, igniting a fire deep within.

dialogue.speaker: All For One
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Vanguard Action Squad. Allow me to introduce you to your new family, where chaos reigns supreme.

dialogue.speaker: Dabi
dialogue.text: You look like you'll fit right in with our delightful madness. Just remember, don't cross me, or you might end up as a smoldering pile of ash.

dialogue.speaker: Himiko
dialogue.text: Oh, I'm so excited! You seem like someone who knows how to have fun. I can't wait to see what you're made of—maybe even taste it! What's your blood type? Hehe!

dialogue.speaker: Twice
dialogue.text: And I'll make a copy of you! We can have a party with the real you and the clone—just imagine the chaos!

dialogue.speaker: Mr. Compass
dialogue.text: Focus, everyone. We have a mission to execute. No slip-ups. We're going for Bakugo.

dialogue.speaker: Spinner
dialogue.text: With you on our side, this will be a cakewalk. U.A. won't even know what hit them.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: As they devise their wicked plan to capture Katsuki Bakugo, a thrilling sense of power courses through you—a heady mix of rebellion and darkness.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The day has arrived. You stand shoulder to shoulder with your comrades, the air thick with anticipation. This is your moment—ready to dive headfirst into a world of chaos.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Every calculated step fills you with adrenaline, the thrill of danger intoxicating your senses.

dialogue.speaker: Dabi
dialogue.text: Keep low and stick to the shadows. We're not here to play nice; let's make some noise and draw them in.

dialogue.speaker: Himiko
dialogue.text: I can't wait to meet Bakugo! Just imagine his face when he sees me! I wonder how much he'll scream… or if I can make him bleed! Hehe!

dialogue.speaker: Twice
dialogue.text: This is gonna be a blast! Let's give 'em a show they won't forget!

dialogue.speaker: Izuku Midoriya
dialogue.text: Stop right there! You can't just barge in here!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: You stand before the heroes you once admired, heart racing as dark ambition stirs within you. The weight of your choices presses down, but the thrill of the chase ignites a fire in your soul.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: As the tension crackles in the air, you find yourself at a crossroads. Will you embrace the darkness, reveling in your newfound power, or will you turn back against the tide? The choice is yours, and the consequences will echo in the shadows…
